column4: As your using WINE and have only 4GB of RAM, your best bet is to stick to 32-bit version as more support for 32-bit WINE & 32-bit Ubuntu.
that is what i was thinking but didn't know for sure ...
right now under 32 bit i'm working great but i have a issue with the bluetooth connecter ... it keeps asking for the pin number every time it connects
As your CPU is 64-bit enabled (assuming it has virtualization extensions) if you wanted to test out 64-bit OS functionality you can virtualize it via VirtualBox
